main event: A round, ball-shaped object was observed streaking across the sky at Tinker AFB, Oklahoma on 11 May 1955.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 35 inches in diameter and had yellow and red colors with blue streaks behind it.,The blue streaks were reported to be twice as long as the object.,The object was traveling from south to north at an estimated speed of 100-150 mph.,The sighting lasted for one to two seconds before the object disappeared as if 'burned out.', The investigation suggested that the sighting could possibly be a meteor.
sighted object: round, ball-shaped object with colors yellow, red, and blue streaks
